# Nets Specifications {#app:appNet}

(ref:offshorenet) Net specifications (upper, lower and side views) for the offshore NPAFC 1142 midwater trawl net used on the the `r surveyName` from `r surveyDateRange` on the `r vessel`.

```{r offshorenet1}
# split figures to fit better
knitr::include_graphics("knitr-figs-pdf/LFS1142net_upper_horizontal.png")

```

\newpage

```{r offshorenet2, fig.cap="(ref:offshorenet)"}

knitr::include_graphics("knitr-figs-pdf/LFS1142net_lower_horizontal.png")
knitr::include_graphics("knitr-figs-pdf/LFS1142net_side_horizontal.png")

```


(ref:coastalnet) Net specifications (side only) for the coastal NPAFC 7742 midwater trawl net the `r surveyName` from `r surveyDateRange` on the `r vessel`.

```{r coastalnet, fig.cap="(ref:coastalnet)"}

knitr::include_graphics("knitr-figs-pdf/LFS7742_side.png")

```
